amendment.description: Amendment provides $2.5 million for the Homeless Veterans Reintegration Project administered by the Department of Labor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to designate $2.5 million of the funds appropriated for St ewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance to be directed to homless veterans' reintegration projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Evans amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
